description_configure_lyvego: ⚙️ You can fully configure the bot on [lyvego.com]({0})
help_description_header:
You can configure the bot on [lyvego.com]({0})
Remove the <> when you are using a command.
help_streamer: Send notification when the streamer goes live. (Server only - Admin required)
help_follow: Send notification when someone follow this streamer. (Server only - Admin required)
help_clip: Get the 5 most watch clips for the past last week. (Server only)
author_name_most_viewed_clips: {0} - Most viewed clips of the week
message_stream_live: @everyone Hey {streamer} is live on {game} ! Go check him out
error_streamer_not_found: {0} This streamer doesn't exist, please retry with a valid one.
error_clips_not_found: {0} Sorry but there is no clips for this streamer.
